title: Expensive Calculation with useMemo
instructions:
Create a component that demonstrates useMemo for expensive calculations.

Requirements:
1. Create an input for a number
2. Calculate the factorial of that number
3. Use useMemo to memoize the calculation
4. Add a counter that changes frequently (every click)
5. Show that the factorial doesn't recalculate when only the counter changes

useMemo caches computation results, only recalculating when dependencies change.
